name: audako-core
description: Core Services, Models and Functions for the audako platform

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc -p ./lib/tsconfig.json && tsc -p ./lib/tsconfig-cjs.json && echo '{"type": "module"}' > dist/mjs/package.json && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json

author: Jacob Deuchert
